paper.title: Expressibility results for linear-time and branching-time logics
paper.venue: Linear Time, Branching Time and Partial Order in Logics and Models for Concurrency, School/Workshop
paper.abstract: We investigate the expressive power of linear-time and branching-time temporal logics as fragments of the logic CTL*. We give a simple characterization of those CTL* formulas that can be expressed in linear-time logic. We also give a simple method for showing that certain CTL* formulas cannot be expressed in the branching-time logic CTL. Both results are illustrated with examples.
